name: Nature Pixel Art Coloring Book
description:
Do you love nature? We do, that's why we created pixel coloring app for nature lovers. From beautiful landscapes to animals and flora images. We add new pictures and categories daily to make sure you are not bored. Calm your nerves and color pixels by numbers!

How our app works:
1. Choose pixel art image you like;
2. Choose the color from the palette;
3. Color boxes with appropriate numbers one by one or using continuous coloring;
4. Share the result with others;

Why are we better than other apps in the market:
1. We are nature targeted, but have a lot of other puzzles in the app as well;
2. We have settings for you to play with to make your unique personal coloring experience;
3. All of our puzzles are free for you to use, no subscriptions;
4. We update image database daily!

So what are you waiting for? Come on in and relieve some stress!
